title: Chaos Border
body: Hi I've never gotten a border before and I was able to save up enough chaos tokens to get the Chaos border and icon. But IDK how to equip the border and i cant find it under profile or anything like that. Can somebody help me? It isn't showing up in-game.

replies.body: As long as you've unlocked the icon, you're set!  You shouldn't need to have it equipped to make it show.  Just use the correlating skin for the icon that was unlocked!  :D

I didn't see that part about having the 1820(!) RP skin in the description anywhere. Now I have a border I'll never use for a champion and skin I never intend on buying.

:Edit:
I found it in the FAQ...on the actual website that you have to leave the game client to see, 4th from last question in the FAQ. I wish that was easier to find or made more obvious in the client.
hats cheap, incorporating a border but limiting it to a 20 dollar skin. that's some money hungry evil business shit. respect the players man, that's all i'm saying.
oh, i thought it was a border that could be used for any champion I didn't know it was for Yasuo only I can't really afford the skin .-.  nor do I really play Yasuo. oh well least the icon is cool.
i want my RP back..nobody tells that i need Yasuo skin
WAIT SO I HAVE TO BUT THE YASUO SKIN UGH
Oh my god if it said that on the client I would've just gotten keys to open more chests! What the fuck Riot, what a shitty attempt at a cash grab. Greedy company!
I thought its a profile border. :(

Riot should have specified in the description of the Icon/Border that it was only for the Yasuo/Riven skins. You can't just assume that people will get the icon/border and instantly know it's only for the Yasuo/Riven skins. That's low riot.
Same problem..i spend RP to buy this icon and border but i get only icon {{champion:122}}

Why give people the option of unlocking a prize in an event, but not let them have it unless they bought the skin? I wish i new that before, just wasted RP on an item I can only see if I buy a skin for a champ I do not play {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
